data.title: Bureau of Cannabis Control Announces Enforcement Action on Unlicensed Cannabis Operator
data.excerpt: The Bureau of Cannabis Control and the Department of Consumer Affairs’ Division of Investigation-Cannabis Enforcement Unit, in coordination with the Costa Mesa Police Department and local agencies, today announced enforcement action on an unlicensed cannabis business operating in Costa Mesa.
data.author: Department of Cannabis Control
